title: Save Your Marriage the Sexy Way - for both men and women
description: IN THIS BOOK YOU WILL FIND OUT - Why your marriage is worth saving - How to supercharge your sex-life - How to futureproof your marriage from failure - Why so many regret divorce - How to unleash testosterone and estrogen for the best sex you have ever had - How to heighten your intimacy and closeness - How to give your partner such great sex that they will keep wanting more - How to rekindle love that is growing cold - How to increase your partner's desire for you many times over. A totally practical guide. Includes multitudes of tips and 'how-tos'.Ken Llewellyn is an expert on male-female relationships. An international author and speaker, he has travelled and addressed audiences on virtually every continent of the globe.
author: Ken  Llewellyn
